ias_36_impairment_of_assets.reason_of_the_status: No disclosure of impairment testing for non-current assets (PP&E, investment in shares) despite potential indicators.

ias_37_provisions_contingent_liabilities.reason_of_the_status: No provisions or contingent liabilities disclosed. No mention of whether any exist. Basic compliance but disclosure is lacking.

ias_38_intangible_assets.reason_of_the_status: No intangible assets recognized or disclosed.

ifrs_1_first_time_adoption.reason_of_the_status: Not a first-time adopter of IFRS.

ifrs_3_business_combinations.reason_of_the_status: No business combinations during the period.

ifrs_5_non_current_assets_held_for_sale.reason_of_the_status: No non-current assets classified as held for sale.

ifrs_7_financial_instruments_disclosures.reason_of_the_status: No disclosures on credit risk, liquidity risk, market risk for financial instruments.

ifrs_8_operating_segments.reason_of_the_status: Single operating segment (garment manufacturing for export).

ifrs_9_financial_instruments.reason_of_the_status: Basic classification of financial assets/liabilities apparent but no ECL impairment for receivables, no hedge accounting, no detailed categorization.

ifrs_10_consolidated_financial_statement.reason_of_the_status: These are separate financial statements, not consolidated.

ifrs_12_disclosure_of_interests_in_other.reason_of_the_status: No disclosures about subsidiaries, joint ventures, associates, or unconsolidated structured entities beyond investment in shares note.
